name: Escape From Haven Hospital
description:
-THE YEAR IS 1885

After being bounced from orphanage to orphanage, our protagonist Janet winds up in the hands of the greedy McMann family. After they hear about a developing medical facility that pays for new patients, they swiftly drop her at the bottom of the driveway of HAVEN HOSPITAL and collect their check.

The doctors seem friendly at first, walking Janet through the halls showing their founder’s portraits and telling the stories of how the hospital was formed. A group of scientists wanted to push the capabilities of the human body, especially those who have repressed anger and pain from a young age. In doing so, they discovered powers hidden within the human mind, but once those powers were activated, their minds collapsed.

After discovering this, Janet attempted to escape but was caught and experimented on. By some miracle, she survived the activation and realized that she could outwit the doctors. Some doctors used the same strain of experiments that Janet was given, and gained powers for themselves.

Team Members:

Thomas Newsom: Producer, Sound Designer, Programmer

Denis Besic: Programmer

Colin Yoon: Background Artist

Alec Reyes: Animator 

Alex Illukin: Game Designer, Programmer

Michael Barcroft: Garbage Programmer
